page.title: 15Tal_y_Bont Village
page.content:
Interview continued: 8.Do you like living in Tal_y_Bont, why? Quiet, friendly community 9.Do you find not having a superstore awkward? No, as most had cars. 10.Have you noticed an increase in the population of Tal_y_Bont, when? 1973 when housing estate was built.
Houses in the housing estate are quite small & are semi_detached. They have about 8 rooms & were built in 1973. The houses have a garden at the front which has s small path running through it to the front door. There is also a small garden at the back. A typical house has a living room with a television, 3 piece suite & in the kitchen is a cooker, sink & a washing machine.
